test_case.query_expression: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT lid, rid, COUNT(lstr) AS c FROM ( SELECT proposal_id AS lid, title AS lstr FROM src1.proposals UNION SELECT proposal AS lid, comment AS lstr FROM src1.reviews ) AS sub1, ( SELECT proposal_id AS rid, title AS rstr FROM src1.proposals UNION SELECT proposal AS rid, comment AS rstr FROM src1.reviews ) AS sub2 GROUP BY lid, rid ) AS sub WHERE c < 5 AND (lid = 1) AND (rid = 2)
